entry.title: Home for the Holidays & Momma’s Kitchen Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 53.20

Enjoy two candles in our Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining & Momma's Kitchen Bundle. These fragrances each feature a unique blend of fresh and cozy notes that are perfect for enjoying the time spent together.

Get each candle for only $26.60 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $22.80!)

Momma's Kitchen: cinnamon, apple, + pine (strong strength)
Home for the Holidays: balsam, citrus, + apple (moderate strength)

BURN TIME: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total).

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural, paraffin free soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Sulfate free, phthalate free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”


Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Momma's Kitchen Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Momma’s Kitchen is a warm and cozy blend of green apples, bright peach, and fresh pine, highlighted with a heart of cinnamon and notes of sweet balsamic spice. With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this spiced and bakey fragrance gives you a strong strength that captures the nostalgic aroma of homemade treats baked with love.

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.

WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

Enjoy Momma's Kitchen in additional products.

entry.title: For the Momma Gift Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift Box
Price: 65.00

Beautiful, personal gifting is here. New, artisanal gift boxes are intentionally curated to help you stay connected.

Celebrate & show some love to the Momma in your life with this unique gift box: ready-to-gift, & thoughtfully built with your loved one in mind—just in time for Mother’s Day! Each gift box is packaged with care & includes:

  • Momma’s Kitchen 16 oz Mason Jar Candle – Smells like cinnamon, apples, pine, & nostalgia.
  • “Hymns for a Mother’s Heart” – Beautifully created by The Daily Grace Co., it is filled with 21 hymns, prayers, & reflections that point toward Jesus.
  • Love You Mom Wooden Bookmark – A stunning, tasseled bookmark featuring an encouraging quote, “My mother taught me a woman’s mind should be the most beautiful part of her.”
  • A heartfelt message written especially for the receiver. You can easily include a personalized gift note in the Cart as well!

This curated box is completely gift-ready—you can even ship it directly to the momma in your life! Enjoy peace of mind, unique gifts, & cozy fragrances with new Gift Boxes. Thoughtful gifting made easy.

entry.title: Momma’s Kitchen Luxe Candle Bundle of Three
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Luxe Candles
Price: 67.20

The new Luxe Collection features a luxurious, refined simplicity that creates timeless elegance with a modern aesthetic in your space. The frosted glass jars have a soft, satin-like finish and are paired with natural, wooden pine lids.

Momma’s Kitchen is a warm and cozy blend of green apples, bright peach, and fresh pine, highlighted with a heart of cinnamon and notes of sweet balsamic spice.

Get each candle for only $28.33 each when you purchase a bundle of three Luxe Candles. (Save $11!)

BURN TIME: Up to 46 hours of burn time per candle (138 total hours).

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 8.4 oz (238 g)

DIMENSIONS: 4 3/8” x 3 1/8”

Enjoy more fragrances in the Luxe Collection.


Due to the artisanal nature of these candles, some variation in the natural soy wax may occur.

entry.title: Momma's Kitchen Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift
Price: 55.00

Gifting just got easier with our Momma's Kitchen Gift Set!


Momma’s Kitchen is a warm and cozy blend of green apples, bright peach, and fresh pine, highlighted with a heart of cinnamon and notes of sweet balsamic spice. With up to 64 hours of burn time in our 16 oz candle, this spiced and bakey fragrance features a strong strength that captures the nostalgic aroma of homemade treats baked with love. Paired with our branded Wick Trimmer and an adorable Safety Matchbox.

Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting, and even burn. We use premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. All candles are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This hand-picked fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.


*Products containing matches are unable to be shipped to addresses in Alaska and Hawaii at this time.*
